body: This is the most enjoyable, chronological doujin series I’ve ever read. Deff best Pokemon doujin author of all time
i wanna see Lillie get raped by Ash before the year ends T.T
Half of what makes Gambler Club doujins so great is how fucking funny they are
No one is too old for pokemon u genwunner. This is generation 7
Damm right!! Thanks translators, i was waiting for this since it came, Kousaka Jun Banzai!!

The ruiner of childhoods..

who am I kidding I don't even know what generation are those from and who the hell they are. too old for this shit, generation 1 is all i know
